nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT SUM(azure.datashare.accounts.ShareCount) AS 'Total Share Count', SUM(`azure.datashare.accounts.FailedShareSubscriptionSynchronizations`) AS 'Total Received Share Failed Snapshots', SUM(`azure.datashare.accounts.SucceededShareSynchronizations`) AS 'Total Sent Share Succeeded Snapshots', SUM(`azure.datashare.accounts.SucceededShareSubscriptionSynchronizations`) AS 'Total Received Share Succeeded Snapshots' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.datashare/accounts'

rawConfiguration.text:
# Azure Data Share
Azure Data Share enables organizations to securely share data with multiple customers and partners. Data providers are always in control of the data that they've shared and Azure Data Share makes it simple to manage and monitor what data was shared, when and by whom.Share data from the list of supported data stores with customers and partners outside of your organization.

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT SUM(azure.datashare.accounts.SucceededShareSynchronizations) AS 'Total Sent Share Succeeded Snapshots' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.datashare/accounts' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT SUM(azure.datashare.accounts.ShareSubscriptionCount) AS 'Total Received Shares' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.datashare/accounts' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT SUM(azure.datashare.accounts.ShareCount) AS 'Total Sent Shares' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.datashare/accounts' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT SUM(azure.datashare.accounts.FailedShareSubscriptionSynchronizations) AS 'Total Received Share Failed Snapshots' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.datashare/accounts' TIMESERIES AUTO
